title: Incremental RBF-based cross-tier interference mitigation for resource-constrained dense IoT networks in 5G communication system
content:
Publication date: Available online 12 June 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Omar Alruwaili, Jaganathan Logeshwaran, Yuvaraj Natarajan, Majed Abdullah Alrowaily, Shobhit K. Patel, Ammar Armghan
